body_text: I've included the @abstract jsdoc prop to the comments, which defines the property as members that must be implemented (or overridden) by objects that inherit the member. I think this should suffice.
body: I've included the `@abstract` jsdoc prop to the comments, which [defines the property](http://usejsdoc.org/tags-abstract.html) as `members that must be implemented (or overridden) by objects that inherit the member.` I think this should suffice.
body_html: I've included the @abstract jsdoc prop to the comments, which defines the property as members that must be implemented (or overridden) by objects that inherit the member. I think this should suffice.
